mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_post (title, view_count, post_html, like_count, address, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{viewCount}, #{postHtml},#{likeCount},#{address}, #{userId.userId})
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.user_id, u.nickname, u.email FROM study_post b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY b.view_count DESC
SELECT b.*, u.user_id, u.nickname, u.email FROM study_post b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY b.post_date DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT b.*, u.user_id, u.nickname, u.email FROM study_post b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.study_id = #{studyId}
